scripts.prepare: yarn update-browserslist-db && yarn dedupe && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --topological-dev --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run prepare
scripts.recompile: yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --topological-dev --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run recompile
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach -Api --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run watch
scripts.artefacts: yarn run prepare && yarn run pack:all
scripts.pack:all: yarn run pack:version && yarn run pack:dev
scripts.update:deps: yarn upgrade-interactive && yarn dedupe && yarn update:sdks && yarn update:license-info
scripts.update:yarn: yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn dedupe && yarn run update:sdks
scripts.update:all: yarn run update:yarn && yarn run update:deps
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --topological-dev --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients npm publish
